brief.content-text:
Diagram 3, Activity

The diagram depicts an activity in which you must match one of the W LAN components to a characteristic.

W LAN Components
Bridge
AP
Antenna
Client

One.Also known as an S T A.
Two.Converts Ethernet Frame type to 8 0 2 dot 11 format.
Three.Increases the strength of the wireless signal.
Four.A mobile device that can participate in the wireless LAN.
Five.Allows long range wireless communication.
Six.Controls access by wireless clients into the wired LAN.
Seven.Receives the wireless signal from an S T A.
